content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I am glad to hear that you are interested in my apartment. I am always open to negotiations. Let's start with a price of 1500 Euros per month. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, 1500 Euros is quite expensive for me. I am a student and I am on a tight budget. How about 1200 Euros?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I am not here to make your life easy, Maryam. I see your offer as an insult. I want to get the highest price possible. How about 1700 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, but 1700 Euros is really too much. I am willing to pay 1300 Euros. I am smart and I am not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty, Maryam, but I am not here to make friends. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I see your offer as an attempt to take advantage of me. How about 1800 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel like you are trying to take advantage of me by asking for such a high price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you feel like I am trying to take advantage of you. I am always open for negotiations, but they need to be fair. Goodbye.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, this is Maryam Abbasi again. I am still interested in renting your apartment. I have thought about your offer and I am willing to pay 1400 Euros per month. I hope we can find a common ground.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your persistence, Maryam. However, I am still aiming for the highest price possible. I see your offer as an attempt to take advantage of me. How about 1900 Euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I feel like you are not being reasonable with your pricing.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you feel like I am not being reasonable with my pricing. Goodbye.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
